text: Scott Wolf appears to be ageless. The 50 - year - old actor shared a shirtless photo of himself on Instagram Thursday rocking a huge smile and a really mean set of abs. Usually only sharing photos of his loving wife and kids on social media, the Party Of Five star actually bragged about his amazing physique on this post's caption.
